channel.title: [pi]
channel.description: ok im having issues with a pi server. my npcs keep disappearing after an object or a npc that teles u somewhere is used. like if i were to talk to a guy to teleport to a minigame, all the npcs would disappear for about 10seconds and come back. i was wondering on how to fix this?

item.title: [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Karma_K1 Karma_K
item.description:
@Karma_K1 wrote:

nope. im talking about all npcs disappearing. all the autospawned npcs disappear

Read full topic

item.title: [pi]
item.dc:creator: @k1ng0frs k1ng0frs
item.description:
@k1ng0frs wrote:

did you use a npc spawn command? if yes you need to add the the npc to your autospawn config

Read full topic
